permission.name: ui.access
permission.summary: Allow access to the Web UI
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to login and access the web user interface

permission.name: ui.config.view
permission.summary: Allow access to view check configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view check configuration

permission.name: api.access
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to utilise the API

permission.name: api.read.*
permission.summary: Allow reading of objects via the API
permission.description: Root of all API read permissions

permission.name: api.write.*
permission.summary: Allow modification of objects via the API
permission.description: Root of all API write permissions

permission.name: api.write.contact.set-password
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to set passwords of an contact

permission.name: api.write.contact.create
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to create contacts

permission.name: api.read.contact
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read contacts

permission.name: api.read.contact.config
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read contact configuration
